summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and environmental protection, amending Sections 22.208.060, 22.808.040, 23.60.070, 23.60.072, 23.60.076, 23.60.924, 23.60.936, 23.60.944, 23.76.012, 23.76.022, 23.76.024, 23.76.056, 23.90.019, 25.05.680, 25.05.908, 25.09.020, and 25.28.310 of the Seattle Municipal Code in order to comply with Chapters 347 and 382 of the 1995 Session Laws of the State of Washington.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
